Posts.Content: Jan 19, 2018 01:38AM Vitazza wrote: Hello I started chemo on 11/2,17 AC four rounds two weeks apart. I buzzed my hair down on the 10th and by Thanksgiving I was BALD! i have many wigs and just have fun changing them for my mood.I take pepcid and claritin daily So no bone pain or acid pit. If you will get the Nuelasta pod the claritin helps. t started Taxol on 1/4/18 I had my third dose today.. I started with mild numbness on my right foot on Sunday 15th. Now as I am tapping.. I am numb in my right hand and foot... ðŸ˜• I heard l Glutamine, vitamin B complex supplements, and .Aleve may be helpful so I'm trying that in the morning..
